import React, { useState } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { setShowTrams } from '../reducers/showTramsReducer' import { setMyStop } from '../reducers/myStopReducer' import { setCenter } from '../reducers/centerReducer' import { setZoom } from '../reducers/zoomReducer' import { setMyTram } from '../reducers/myTramReducer' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button, Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import distance, { sortByVehicleNumbers, sortLineNumbers, sortStopNames, } from '../utils/helpers' const Sidebar = ({ closeSidebar, showSidebar, trams, //showTrams, setShowTrams, setCenter, setZoom, stops, myStop, setMyStop, myTram, setMyTram, }) => { const [line, setLine] = useState(0) const style = showSidebar ? { width: '250px' } : { width: '0' } const handleChooseMyTram = veh => { console.log('TRAM CHOSEN: ', veh) if (veh !== 'reset') { let chosenTram = trams.find(tram => tram.VP.veh == veh) console.log('chosen Tram:', chosenTram) setMyTram(chosenTram) setShowTrams([]) setCenter({ lat: chosenTram.VP.lat, lng: chosenTram.VP.long }) //setZoom(16) } else { setMyTram('') setLine(0) } } const handleShowLine = line => { console.log('LINE CHOSEN: ', line) setShowTrams(trams.filter(tram => parseInt(tram.VP.desi) == line)) setZoom(13) } const handleChooseStop = stopsGtfsId => { console.log('STOP CHOSEN: ', stopsGtfsId) setMyStop(stops.find(stop => stop.gtfsId === stopsGtfsId)) } let tramsInOrder = [...trams] tramsInOrder.sort(sortByVehicleNumbers) const lineNumbers = [] trams.forEach(tram => { if (!lineNumbers.includes(parseInt(tram.VP.desi))) { lineNumbers.push(parseInt(tram.VP.desi)) } }) lineNumbers.sort(sortLineNumbers) const stopsInOrder = [...stops] stopsInOrder.sort(sortStopNames) return (
{!myStop ? 'CHOOSE STOP' : myStop.name + ' ' + myStop.gtfsId} {stopsInOrder.map((stop, i) => ( handleChooseStop(stop.gtfsId)} > {stop.name} {stop.gtfsId} ))} {line > 0 ? 'Line: ' + line : 'Line?'} {lineNumbers.map((line, i) => ( setLine(line)}> {line} ))} {myTram.VP ? 'Vehicle: ' + myTram.VP.veh : 'Vehicle?'} {line === 0 ? ( - ) : ( handleChooseMyTram('reset')}> reset )} {tramsInOrder .filter(tram => tram.VP.desi == line) .map((tram, i) => ( handleChooseMyTram(tram.VP.veh)} > {tram.VP.veh} ))} {myTram.VP && myStop && ( Distance:{' '} {distance( myStop.lat, myStop.lon, trams.find(tram => tram.VP.veh === myTram.VP.veh).VP.lat, trams.find(tram => tram.VP.veh === myTram.VP.veh).VP.long ).toFixed(2)}{' '} km )} Show Line {lineNumbers.map((line, i) => ( handleShowLine(line)}> {line} ))}
) } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { trams: state.trams, //showTrams: state.showTrams, showSidebar: state.showSidebar, stops: state.stops, myStop: state.myStop, myTram: state.myTram, } } const mapDispatchToProps = { setShowTrams, setMyStop, setCenter, setZoom, setMyTram, } export default connect( mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps )(Sidebar) { /*
My stop {stopsInOrder.map((stop, i) => ( ))} Choose tram {!myTram.VP ? ( ) : ( )} {tramsInOrder.map((tram, i) => ( ))} Show line {lineNumbers.map((line, i) => ( ))}
*/ }
